info.name: Titus Simulator API
info.description: API collection for testing Titus Simulator endpoints. This collection includes all API endpoints for roster management, simulation triggers, and status monitoring.

request.description: Check if the Titus Simulator API is running and healthy.
Upload roster data (NGRS format) to the simulator. This endpoint accepts the complete NGRS roster JSON with __metadata structure.
Trigger simulation using previously uploaded roster data. Generates clock-in/out events for all assignments.
Fetch roster from NGRS API for a specific date and run simulation. Requires NGRS API to be accessible.
Retrieve simulation statistics including total events generated, sent events, and completion rates.
Mock endpoint representing NGRS Clocking API. This is where Titus Simulator sends clock-in/out events. Use this to test the clocking event format.
